page.title: 11A Day IN The Life Of Fiona 2
page.content:
Fiona spends her time after tea reading before it is time to get ready for bed.At 7.50 Fiona usually goes upstairs to have a wash,brush her teeth and put on her night clothes."I then go back downstairs and have a drink of cocoa." "I then go up to bed and my mum and dad come up after a while to check that I am not messing around!" Fiona told us that during the holidays and sometimes at weekends she was allowed to stay up later. We asked Fiona about her favourite food. New potatoes,roast beef,peas,rice pudding,jelly. Hobbies:- skipping,reading,writing and collecting stamps.
-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-
